dict.string: Active: Blink - Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. If damage is taken, Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3.0 seconds.

Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.If you used Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.
The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.
The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.
A medium weave of metal chains.
A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.
The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.
Passive: Pierce - Grants each attack a chance to deal bonus damage.
+10 TextDamage CHANCE TO PIERCE: 25% PIERCE DAMAGE: 85
A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.
A hammer forged of pure mithril.
Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.
A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

Active: Chop Tree/Ward - Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targetting wards. Passive: Quell - Increases attack damage against non-hero units, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. Does not provide bonus damage against Roshan.
Cannot carry more than one.Chop can be used to destroy Techies' Land Mines and Remote Mines.
QUELL MELEE DAMAGE: 140% QUELL RANGED DAMAGE: 115% CHOP TREE CAST RANGE: 350 CHOP WARD CAST RANGE: 450
The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.
Use: Consume the Faerie Fire to instantly restore 75 HP
A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.
Passive: Damage Block - Gives a chance to block damage based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
MELEE DAMAGE BLOCK: 16 RANGED DAMAGE BLOCK: 8 BLOCK CHANCE: 50%
One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.
Use: Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain 60 attack speed. Does not stack. Passive: Shade Sight - Grants 250 bonus night vision.
The bonus night vision works during Night Stalker's Darkness ability.
+120 TextAttack Speed SHADE BONUS NIGHT VISION: 250 CONSUME ATTACK SPEED: 60
Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.
Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.
Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.
A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.
Active: Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.
A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.
A valued accessory for improving vitality.
A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.
This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.
An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.
You grow stronger just by holding it.
A long blade imbued with time magic.
A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.
A mystical orb containing the essence of life.
A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

Passive: Lifesteal - Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.
Morbid Mask is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.
This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.
A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.
Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Passive: True Sight - Adds the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within its carrier's range. Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.
Not one thrall creature of the depths, Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep, Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular, Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.
Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.
Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.
Use: Consume to instantly restore health and mana.
Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.
Active: Energy Charge - Instantly restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored. Gains a charge (max 10) whenever a nearby visible enemy uses an ability.
Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
Active: Energy Charge - Instantly restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored. Gains a charge (max 17) whenever a nearby visible enemy uses an ability.
Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

Active: Ghost Form - Enter ghost form, becoming immune to physical damage, yet unable to attack and taking 40% extra magic damage. Using a Town Portal Scroll or Boots of Travel will not dispel Ghost Form.
Ends if you become Spell Immune, and will have no effect if you are already Spell Immune.Shares cooldown with Ethereal Blade.
+5 TextAll Attributes GHOST DURATION: 4 GHOST ADDED MAGIC DAMAGE: 40%
Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.
Use: Restores mana to the target unit over time. If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.
Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

Use: Consume the mango to instantly restore 150 mana.
Hold Control to use Enchanted Mango on an allied hero.
The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.
Use: Restores health to the target unit over time. If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.
A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.
Use: Reveals and slows invisible Heroes in a nearby area.
Places a buff on enemy units in the area that prevents them from becoming invisible.

Use: Regenerate - Consumes a charge to restore Health and Mana over time. Healing stops if attacked. Bottle can be refilled at your team's fountain. Runes can be stored in the Bottle for later use, and are activated automatically after 2 minutes. If Bottle does not have full charges and is placed on a courier, the courier will move 30% slower.
Hold Control to use Regenerate on an allied hero. Stored runes cannot be shared.
An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.

Use: Plants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives vision of its surrounding area to your team. Lasts 7 minutes.
Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.
A form of half-sentient plant, often cultivated by apprentice wizards.

Use: Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within its range. Lasts 4 minutes.
Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.
A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.

Double-Click to switch the currently active ward.
Use: Plant the currently active ward to keep watch over an area. Observer Wards reveal their surrounding area to your team. Sentry Wards grant True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within its range.
OBSERVER VISION RANGE: 1600 OBSERVER DURATION (MINUTES): 7 SENTRY TRUE SIGHT RANGE: 850 SENTRY DURATION (MINUTES): 4
Advancements in stacking efficiency have made wards easier to carry than ever.

Use: Eat a Tree or Ward - Consume a target tree or ward to gradually restore health.
Comes with 4 charges. Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.
Heals for double duration when used on a Ironwood Tree or Wards.
EAT TREE HEALTH RESTORED: 115 EAT WARD HEALTH RESTORED: 230 EAT WARD CAST RANGE: 450 HEAL DURATION: 16
Forage to survive on the battlefield.
Use: Eat a Tree or Ward - Consume a target tree or ward to gradually restore health.
Heals for double duration when used on a Ironwood Tree or Wards.
EAT TREE HEALTH RESTORED: 115 EAT WARD HEALTH RESTORED: 230 EAT WARD CAST RANGE: 450 HEAL DURATION: 16
Use: Deploy Courier - Deploys a creature to carry items to and from your team's base.
Losing the courier is punishable by death.
Use: Teleport - Teleports you to a target friendly building. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
If multiple heroes teleport to the same location in succession, the channeling time will be increased for each successive hero.

Active: Teleport - Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain. Upgradable to allow you to teleport to allied heroes.
Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Shares cooldown with Town Portal Scrolls.

Active: Phase - Gives increased movement speed and lets you move through units. The increased movement speed is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
+45 TextMovement Speed +24 TextDamage PHASE MOVE BOOST MELEE: 24% PHASE MOVE BOOST RANGED: 20% PHASE DURATION: 2.5
Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.
One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.
Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.
A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.
An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.
A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.
A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.
Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.
Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.
This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.
A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.
A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

Active: Switch Attribute - Changes selected attribute between Strength, Agility and Intelligence.
Power Treads can be built using a Belt of Strength, Band of Elvenskin, or a Robe of the Magi. Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack, nor does the attack speed bonus from multiple Power Treads.
+45 TextMovement Speed +9 TextSelected Attribute +25 TextAttack Speed
A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.
Active: Transmute - Kills a non-hero target for 190 gold and 2.5x experience. Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.
The gold given is reliable gold (you do not get the normal creep bounty).Experience gained by using Transmute is not shared.
Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.
+6 TextIntelligence +10 TextAttack Speed +15 TextDamage +75% TextMana Regeneration
Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.
A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

Passive: Damage Block - Blocks physical attack damage based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. Poor Man's Shield will always block attacks from enemy Heroes, but has a 53% chance to block damage from creeps.
Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
+6 TextAgility MELEE DAMAGE BLOCK: 20 RANGED DAMAGE BLOCK: 10 CREEP BLOCK CHANCE: 53%
A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.
The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.
A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.
A small gemstone attached to several chains.

Active: Restore - Heals 250 health and gives +2 armor to allied units in a 900 radius. Passive: Mekansm Aura - Grants 4 health regeneration to allied units in a 900 radius.
Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.
Restore does not affect units that have been affected by Restore in the last 25 seconds.
+5 TextAll Attributes +5 TextArmor AURA HEALTH REGEN: 4 RESTORE HEAL: 250 RESTORE ARMOR: 2 RESTORE ARMOR DURATION: 25 AURA/RESTORE RADIUS: 900
A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.

Passive: Vladmir's Aura - Grants lifesteal, health regeneration, mana regeneration, bonus attack damage, and armor to allies in a 900 radius. The lifesteal percentage is based on whether the hero affected by the aura is melee or ranged.
Multiple instances of Vladmir's Aura do not stack.
Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
+2 TextAll Attributes AURA HEALTH REGEN: 3 AURA MANA REGEN: 0.8 AURA BONUS ARMOR: 5 AURA BONUS ATTACK DAMAGE: 15% AURA MELEE LIFESTEAL: 15% AURA RANGED LIFESTEAL: 10% AURA RADIUS: 900
An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.

Upgrades your team's Animal Courier to a Flying Courier, granting it swift, unobstructed movement to carry items to and from your team's base.
Requires a deployed Animal Courier.
Active: Armor Bonus - Gives +2 armor to all allied units in a 900 radius. Lasts 25 seconds on heroes, 30 seconds on units.
+5 TextArmor +2 TextAll Attributes ARMOR CAST RADIUS: 900
A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

Passive: Basilius Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 area of effect. Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.
Multiple instances of Basilius Aura do not stack.
Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
+6 TextDamage +1 TextArmor AURA MANA REGEN: 0.65 AURA BONUS ARMOR: 2
Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.
Active: Barrier - Gives a shield that blocks 400 spell damage to all allies in a 900 radius. Passive: Insight Aura - Gives allied units 4 health regeneration and 10% magic resistance in a 900 radius.
Barrier does not affect units that have been affected by Barrier in the last 50 seconds.Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
+9 TextHP Regeneration +30% TextSpell Resistance AURA HEALTH REGEN: 4 AURA MAGIC RESISTANCE: 10% AURA RADIUS: 900 BARRIER SPELL BLOCK: 400 BARRIER DURATION: 12.000000 BARRIER CAST RADIUS: 900
A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.

Active: Soul Release - Heals health over time to friendly units, but deals pure damage over time to enemy units. The healing effect is lost if the affected ally takes damage from an enemy hero or tower. Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units. Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.
Empty urns gain 2 charges.If used on a hero with Soul Release already active on them, it will refresh its duration.
+50% TextMana Regeneration +6 TextStrength RELEASE ALLY TOTAL HEAL: 400 RELEASE ENEMY TOTAL DAMAGE: 150 SOUL RELEASE DURATION: 8 SOUL RELEASE CAST RANGE: 950
Contains the ashes of powerful demons.

Passive: Regeneration Aura - Restores health to allies in a 900 unit radius.
Multiple instances of Regeneration Aura do not stack.
+2 TextAll Attributes AURA HEALTH REGEN: 3 AURA REGEN RADIUS: 900
Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.
Active: Hex - Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. Instantly destroys illusions.
The target will have a base movement speed of 140, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
+10 TextStrength +10 TextAgility +35 TextIntelligence +150% TextMana Regeneration HEX DURATION: 3.5
The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.
Active: Soul Burn - Silences the target unit for 5.0 seconds and amplifies the damage it takes by 30.0%.
Amplified damage is dealt at the end of the duration as magical damage.
+25 TextIntelligence +30 TextAttack Speed +30 TextDamage +150% TextMana Regeneration SOUL BURN INCREASED DAMAGE: 30% SOUL BURN DURATION: 5
A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.
Active: Cyclone - Sweeps a target unit up into cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself. Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.
You cannot cyclone allies.Cyclones cast on yourself go through spell immunity.Cyclone can purge some buffs and debuffs.
+10 TextIntelligence +150% TextMana Regeneration +40 TextMovement Speed CYCLONE DURATION: 2.5 CYCLONE CAST RANGE: 575
A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.
Passive: Increases spell cast range by 200 and spell damage output by 8%
+250 TextMana +8 TextHP Regeneration +15% TextSpell Resistance +200 TextCast Range SPELL DAMAGE AMP: 8%
Active: Force - Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing. Double click to instantly cast Force on yourself.
Self-cast will cause you to use Force on yourself.Force Staff doesn't interrupt the target's actions.Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.
Active: Energy Burst - Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.
+13/16/19/22/25 TextIntelligence + 3 TextAll Attributes + 9 TextDamage BURST DAMAGE: 400/500/600/700/800 CAST RANGE: 600/650/700/750/800
A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

Active: Demonic Summoning - Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 40 seconds, whose strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon is upgraded. Warrior gains True Sight at level 3. Upgradable.

+15/21/24 TextIntelligence +8/12/16 TextStrength WARRIOR HEALTH: 700/800/900 WARRIOR DAMAGE: 45/60/75 WARRIOR MANA BREAK: 25/50/75 WARRIOR LAST WILL DMG: 550/675/800 ARCHER HEALTH: 700/800/900 ARCHER DAMAGE: 60/90/120 ARCHER MANA BURN: 125/175/225 ARCHER AURA SPEED: 5%/7%/9%
Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.
Passive: Ultimate Upgrade - Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of certain heroes.
The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.
Active: Reset Cooldowns - Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.
A powerful artifact created for wizards.

Passive: Assault Aura - Grants attack speed and armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases the armor of nearby enemies.
Multiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.
+35 TextAttack Speed +10 TextArmor AURA ATTACK SPEED: 20 AURA ALLY BONUS ARMOR: 5 AURA ENEMY ARMOR REDUCTION: 5
Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

Passive: Health Regeneration - Restores a percentage of max health per second. If damage is taken from an enemy hero or Roshan, this ability is disabled for 5 seconds for melee heroes, or 7 seconds for ranged heroes.
+40 TextStrength +300 TextHealth HEALTH RESTORED PER SECOND: 4.75%
Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.
Active: Avatar - Grants Spell Immunity and 100% Magic Damage Resistance. Duration and cooldown decrease with each use. Some abilities are able to disable through Avatar.
Purchasing another Black King Bar will not reset its immunity duration.Using Black King Bar may remove some positive buffs.
A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

Passive: Reincarnation - Brings you to life with full health and mana 5.0 seconds after you die, at the location where you died. Reincarnation must be used within 5 minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).
The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.

Active: Arctic Blast - Emits a freezing wave that deals 200 magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by -40% for 4.0 seconds. Passive: Freezing Aura - Reduces the attack speed of all enemies in a 900 radius.
Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.
The wave extends at a speed of 350 to a max size of 900.The Arctic Blast follows its caster.
+30 TextIntelligence +15 TextArmor AURA ATTACK SLOW: 45 BLAST DAMAGE: 200 BLAST MOVEMENT SLOW: 40% BLAST SLOW DURATION: 4 BLAST RADIUS: 900
Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.

Active: Pocket Deny - Instantly causes you to die. Passive: Bloodpact - Begins with 8 charges, and gains a charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1675 range. Each charge grants 1 mana regeneration per second, and reduces respawn time by 3 seconds. If the bearer dies, 500 + 30 health per charge is restored to all allies within a 1675 radius, while the Bloodstone loses a third of its charges.
Only the first Bloodstone will gain charges.
+500 TextHealth +400 TextMana +9 TextHP Regeneration +200% TextMana Regeneration
The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.
Passive: Spellblock - Blocks most targeted spells once every 16.0 seconds. Active: Transfer Spellblock - Temporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit.
+15 TextAll Attributes +6 TextHP Regeneration +150% TextMana Regeneration +15 TextDamage
This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.

Active: Echo Shell - Applies a shield to the target unit which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster. The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell. Dispels negative buffs when applied.
+10 TextDamage +10 TextArmor +5 TextHP Regeneration +125% TextMana Regeneration ECHO DURATION: 6 ECHO CAST RANGE: 900
The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.
Passive: Damage Block - Makes the wielder block damage from each incoming attack based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
+250 TextHealth +6 TextHP Regeneration BLOCK DAMAGE MELEE: 32 BLOCK DAMAGE RANGED: 16
A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.

Active: Guard - Grant nearby allied heroes a 100% chance to block 55 damage from each incoming attack, along with 2 armor. Lasts 10 seconds. Passive: Damage Block - Makes the wielder block damage from each incoming attack based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.Guard does not affect units that have been affected by Guard in the last 70 seconds.
+250 TextHealth +6 TextHP Regeneration +2 TextAll Attributes +5 TextArmor BLOCK DAMAGE MELEE: 32 BLOCK DAMAGE RANGED: 16 GUARD ARMOR: 2 GUARD DURATION: 10 GUARD RADIUS: 900 GUARD DAMAGE BLOCK : 55
A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.
Active: Damage Return - Reflects any damage taken back to the unit that dealt the damage. Lasts 4.5 seconds.
Damage Return is calculated after reductions.Damage Return doesn't reflect damage from other forms of Blademail.Returned damage is pure, and does not pierce spell immunity.
+22 TextDamage +6 TextArmor +10 TextIntelligence DAMAGE RETURN DURATION: 4.5
A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.
+450 TextHealth +400 TextMana +4 TextHP Regeneration +100% TextMana Regeneration
Active: Creastes a spell shield that absorbs up to 325 magical damage.
Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
+9 TextHP Regeneration +30% TextSpell Resistance BARRIER BLOCK: 325 BARRIER DURATION: 12.000000
A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.

Drops on death. Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up. A dropped Rapier cannot be picked up by a courier.
If Divine Rapier is dropped and picked up by an enemy of its original owner, it cannot be dropped again except by death.
So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

Passive: Mini-Bash - Grants each attack a chance to deal bonus damage and deal a mini-stun. Passive: True Strike - Prevents your attacks from missing. True Strike does not work when attacking enemy structures.
+66 TextDamage +15 TextAttack Speed MINI-BASH CHANCE: 35% MINI-BASH DAMAGE: 160
A powerful staff used by a master warrior.
Active: Toggle Burn - When active, scorches nearby enemies for 50 damage per second and blinds them, causing them to miss 17% of their attacks.
+65 TextDamage BURN DAMAGE PER SECOND: 50 BURN MISS CHANCE: 17% BURN RADIUS: 700
A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.

Active: Flutter - Trade evasion for 35% additional movement speed for 4.0 seconds.
Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
+30 TextAgility +30 TextDamage +35% TextEvasion +30 TextAttack Speed FLUTTER BONUS MOVE SPEED: 35% FLUTTER DURATION: 4
Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.
Passive: Critical Strike - Grants each attack a chance to deal additional damage. Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.
Passive: Bash - Grants each attack a chance to stun the target for 1.4 seconds and deal 120 bonus damage, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.

Does not stack with other sources of Bash, however it will stack with Mini-Bash (e.g. Monkey King Bar).The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, Slardar, and Troll Warlord.
+10 TextDamage +10 TextStrength BASH MELEE CHANCE: 25% BASH RANGED CHANCE: 10% BASH STUN DURATION: 1.4 BASH BONUS DAMAGE: 120
A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.

Active: Chop Tree/Ward - Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targetting wards. Passive: Quell - Increases attack damage against non-hero units, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. Does not provide bonus damage against Roshan. Passive: Cleave - Deals a percent of attack damage in a 280 area around the target. Ranged units cannot Cleave.

Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.If multiple sources of Cleave are present, each Cleave's damage is applied separately.Chop can be used to destroy Techies' Land Mines and Remote Mines.
+55 TextDamage +6 TextHP Regeneration +150% TextMana Regeneration CLEAVE DAMAGE: 35% QUELL MELEE DAMAGE: 160% QUELL RANGED DAMAGE: 125% CHOP TREE CAST RANGE: 350 CHOP WARD CAST RANGE: 450
The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

Active: Mirror Image - Creates 2 images of your hero that last 20 seconds. Melee heroes have a 30 second cooldown on this ability, while for Ranged heroes the cooldown is 45 seconds.
Melee images deal 33% damage and take 350% damage, while Ranged images deal 28% and take 400% damage.
Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
Has a 0.1 second cast time during which you are invulnerable.Many effects are removed upon using Manta.

+10 TextStrength +26 TextAgility +10 TextIntelligence +15 TextAttack Speed +10% TextMovement Speed NUMBER OF IMAGES: 2 IMAGE DURATION: 20 MELEE IMAGE DAMAGE: 33% MELEE IMAGE DAMAGE TAKEN: 350% RANGED IMAGE DAMAGE: 28% RANGED IMAGE DAMAGE TAKEN: 400%
An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.
Passive: Critical Strike - Grants each attack a chance to deal additional damage. Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.
Passive: Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 130.
+10 TextDamage +10 TextAttack Speed +10 TextStrength +130 TextAttack Range font color='#7d7d7d'(Ranged Only)/font

Active: Toggle Unholy Strength - When active, Unholy Strength grants +31 damage and +25 strength, but drains 40 health per second. You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.

The strength change will affect both maximum and current HP, but you cannot die from the change.The strength change occurs over 0.6 seconds.Activating or deactiving Unholy Strength does not interrupt channeling.
+9 TextDamage +25 TextAttack Speed +5 TextArmor +7 TextHP Regeneration
Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.

Active: Shadow Walk - Makes you invisible until the duration ends, or until you attack or cast a spell. While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units. If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain 175 bonus damage on that attack. Lasts 14.0 seconds.
Has a 0.3 second fade time.If the invisibility ends without attacking, the bonus damage is lost.
+22 TextDamage +30 TextAttack Speed SHADOW WALK DURATION: 14 SHADOW WALK DAMAGE: 175
The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

Active: Shadow Walk - Makes you invisible until the duration ends, or until you attack or cast a spell. While invisible, you move 20% faster and can move through units. Attacking to end the invisibility will deal 225 bonus damage to the target, disable their passive abilities, and reduce their damage output. Passive: Lesser Maim - Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 4.0 seconds.

+32 TextDamage +30 TextAttack Speed +16 TextStrength MAIM CHANCE: 15% MAIM MOVE SLOW: 20% MAIM ATTACK SLOW: 20 MAIM DURATION: 4 SHADOW WALK DURATION: 14 BONUS ATTACK DAMAGE: 225 ENEMY DAMAGE REDUCTION: 40% REDUCTION DURATION: 5
Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.

Passive: Greater Maim - Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 5.0 seconds.
Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
+16 TextDamage +16 TextStrength +16 TextAgility +16 TextAttack Speed +16% TextMovement Speed MAIM CHANCE: 16% MAIM MOVEMENT SLOW: 32% MAIM ATTACK SLOW: 32 MAIM DURATION: 5

If a dominated creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum. Active: Ether Blast - Launches a projectile which converts the target to ethereal form, increasing any incoming magic damage they take, while rendering them immune to physical damage and unable to attack.
